comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: I thought I'd be able to get number 1 if I showed up on time but alas...

comments.author: Fattcatt
comments.body: Awsome     I love the gold against that deep black, looks sharp! Well done!!!

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 07, 2022, 07:35:07 PMQuote from: BTCOVERFIATS on June 07, 2022, 07:30:11 PMI thought I'd be able to get number 1 if I showed up on time but alas...I have you in at #4 I appreciate it but unfortunately I am going to have to withdraw from purchasing this for now. I really wanted either #1 or #21 and thought I was going to be able to get #1 if I showed up here on the dot. I will take my chances by withdrawing from #4 and try to time #21Best,BTCOVERFIATS

comments.author: Mrstacy
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 07, 2022, 07:57:27 PMI am dropping the no requesting serial numbers rule. Buyers can now request serial numbers. I had the gut feeling that it would be too chaotic at open for me to manage the serial number requests, but it has turned out to be rather manageable. Number 6 please or next lowest

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I think it looks great and I'll be proud to hang one of these up in my office.  Thanks for making them.  I can't wait to see if it looks as detailed in person.  My question is about the frame.  Do you have any leads or recommendations about what frame can display these things in all their beauty?  Do you have them in double sided frames or in your pictures are the backs of those frames all black?  Thanks again!  Good luck with the rest of your sales!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 11, 2022, 01:27:30 AMQuote from: OgNasty on June 10, 2022, 07:52:28 PMI think it looks great and I'll be proud to hang one of these up in my office.  Thanks for making them.  I can't wait to see if it looks as detailed in person.  My question is about the frame.  Do you have any leads or recommendations about what frame can display these things in all their beauty?  Do you have them in double sided frames or in your pictures are the backs of those frames all black?  Thanks again!  Good luck with the rest of your sales!2x 18x24 poster frames can be used to accurately display these posters, Although without a light source they would not shine and be full of contrast. In the ideal scenario these posters are professionally framed (mounted). Art lights can be hung over top and it would make for the coolest aesthetic you have ever seen. OH!  I had totally misunderstood this poster.  I thought it was double sided and framed in such a way that you can see both sides.  Not sure why I thought that, but in my mind that would be an awesome way to showcase it in the right spot.  I may have to find some sort of double sided frame to put both of them in and display that way.  In my mind, that's how it was going to be, so that's how it will be.    Thanks for clarifying!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 15, 2022, 02:48:01 AMAll eleven sets have been prepared for dispersal, may they find a good home where they will be well cared for and guarded like treasure.  I went and picked mine up from the post office yesterday.  I haven't opened it yet because I'm still trying to find the right frame and don't want these loose in my house while I do so.  I'm excited though.  They seem to be well packaged in a strong shipping tube.  I'm tempted to get matching frames with my other Bitcoin posters and display them side by side because I'm struggling to find a spot that will display them in all their glory otherwise, but I'm debating...  Thanks for doing this Eclipse33.  Glad to have some Casascius pr0n in my house to display.

comments.author: Jambo USA
comments.body: Got mine in today, they look great! Haven't really given them a once over since I'm waiting on frames to get in, but so far so good!

comments.author: iron77
comments.body: If anyone is interested in selling this set, please PM me with your offer.
